title: New pages
description:
Particularly with all the things being added to GregTech over the last few weeks, I feel there should be a list of new pages that need to be created to compensate.

Things I can think of right now:
-Bronze Age Machines (General page, individual pages, and possibly another tab on the left-side main menu)
-Pipes
-Gears
-Multiblock Machines (General page, including Machine Casings)
-a Main Pages tab on the left-side menu (basically a copy of the list from the Home Page)
-Machine Coloration
-more when either i or someone else thinks of them

replies.body: -the Materials section should probably just be changed to a single page

I'll be working on Plates and Rods and Gears after I finish on the Tools, if I don't rapidly lose interest like I sometimes do over some things. Then I'll probably work on the Bronze Age machines, then other things.
The fluid pipes aren't listened currently are they?
And the Bronze Blast Furnace, the most important of all bronze age machines, is not even listed in the Bronze Age Section.
Well, we are really lacking documentation as you can see... and no the fluid pipes are not documented yet.

Just a thought, mostly to get immibis to stfu:
-tab on the side, specifically for Bronze/Steam machines
Done, now remember to tag them properly.
